column1: Art Institute of Chicago////In terms of art
column2: you can spend your entire day at the museum and still not see everything. I think somewhere on the walls
column3: it said that becoming a member easily is worth it with two visits alone and I have to say I agree. The museum is massive
column4: and with the exception of the first floor
column5: nothing connects. You will get lost in here. Guaranteed. If not lost because of the floor plan
column6: you will get lost in the paintings as you wander on through.
